name: Bitboy (Proxy)
description:
Bitboy is an infinite runner about jumping (through windows), sliding, and trying to stop the end of everything.

You play as Bit, an adventurous young spirit tasked with helping a professor delay a meteor from hitting their home! Jump over vents, dodge pipes, and activate generators that will push the meteor away!

How long can you last? Just remember that there is no stopping the end.

CONTROLS

C / Left Control - Slide

Space - Jump

Esc - Pause

Left Click - Go Through Dialogue/Confirm
